title: Grand Theft Auto Series
content: GTA Rocks (Except 1, & 2). How many of u played GTA: San Andreas? It's already released. Just to remind u that I found out that the PS2 GTA SA is about 2.6 GB, I think. Am i right or wrong? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]   You can check this by putting the disc in your DVD-Rom and right-click Drive "D:\" or whatever drive you put in and then click properties, and that will tell u the answer. BTW, are they gonna be able to release it for PC also? Cause I'm either going to get Vice City or San Andreas for [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img]  .
